name: Blank Boi (ver0.1... I think)
description:
Blank Boi is technically my first ever functional game (Everything else was just moving left, right , and jumping). I don't really know what to else to say.

Controls (If ya want 'em before hand)

A/D = Moves you left and right (Obvs)

Space = Jump (Again, Obvs. Also, no varied jump. Nothing was wanting to work with it)

E = Pick up Boxes (Yay)

Q = Throw Boxes (Y33T)

ESC = Pause the game (Obvs?)

X = Reset Level (Though I don't think it'd be needed)

(Ngl, my Screenshots kinda suck)
